title: Standup Comedy
description: When I'm not researching AI or teaching, I enjoy performing standup comedy. Here you'll find my upcoming shows, past performances, and more.

items.title: Comedy Night at The Laughter Lounge
items.description: Join me for a night of comedy where I'll be sharing stories about life as an AI researcher and the funny side of academia.

items.title: International Comedy Festival
items.description: I'll be performing alongside international comedians at this year's festival, bringing a unique blend of tech humor and cultural observations.

about.title: About My Comedy
paragraphs: My comedy draws from my unique experiences as a woman in tech, an AI researcher, and someone who has lived and worked across multiple countries and cultures. I enjoy finding humor in the everyday challenges of academic life, the quirks of technology, and the cultural differences I've encountered.

I started performing standup comedy as a way to balance the intensity of research work and found that my background in AI and data science gives me a unique perspective that audiences enjoy. My sets often include jokes about machine learning gone wrong, the absurdities of academic publishing, and what it's like to explain to my family what I actually do for a living.

Whether I'm performing for tech professionals who get all the nerdy references or general audiences who appreciate the universal aspects of my stories, I aim to create connections through laughter and shared experiences.
